text:
I found what PFMReader and TTFReader both don't get metrics for character with 
code, returned by getLastChar() functions. Usually it is 0xFF. It matters for 
fonts, in which at this position placed a characters glyph (like cyrillic). 
I resolve this problem for PFMReader by the next steps:
 1) At org/apache/fop/fonts/apps/PFMReader.java, line 392 ("for" condition) im 
replacing ">" ("greater than") conditional symbol to ">=" ("greater-than or 
equal") 
 2) At org/apache/fop/fonts/PFMFile.java, line 236 im increase by 1 the 
dimension for array "extentTable"
Seems what problem in TTFReader to resolve by similar way.
Thanks.
